message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay $850,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with the value you place on it.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, $850,000 is still quite a bit below what I'm hoping to get for this product. I'm willing to come down to $900,000, which reflects the value you've expressed. This would be a fair compromise for both of us. Let me know your thoughts.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for your flexibility. I am willing to increase my offer to $875,000. This is the highest I can go while staying within my budget constraints. I hope we can reach an agreement.
